data.title: Meggitt Defense Systems
data.meta_description: Meggitt Defense Systems is a world leader in the design, manufacture, integration and operation of ammunition handling systems, thermal management systems and components including fans, pumps and compressors for aerospace and defense, in extreme environments and where the best accuracy and reliabili
data.text:
Meggitt Defense Systems is a world leader in the design, manufacture, integration and operation of ammunition handling systems, thermal management systems and components including fans, pumps and compressors for aerospace and defense, in extreme environments and where the best accuracy and reliability are required.

Visitors to the stand will be able to learn about Meggitt’s ground vehicle products, the Auxiliary Cooling and Power System (ACPS) and our 50mm Ammunition Handling System with Linear Linkless™ technology.

Products & Services: Ammunition Handling Systems / Fans / Pumps / Compressors / Thermal Management Systems / Auxiliary Cooling and Power System (ACPS) / Meggitt Defense Systems / Components / Next-Generation / Future / Aerospace / Military Defense / Ammunition / Ammunition Handling Systems / Ammunition Handling System / Thermal / Thermal Management System / ACPS / AHS / ECS / Meggitt PLC / DSEI

Irvine, California, United States

Aerospace, Defense & Security
